title: Increase XP required per player level-up

requirements.summary: Update frontend level progression system to mirror new backend XP thresholds with significantly steeper scaling
acceptanceCriteria: The XP thresholds in `levelSystem.ts` match the updated backend thresholds for all 55 levels.
The PlayerProfile XP progress bar and current level display correctly reflect the new thresholds.
Level calculation utility functions (current level, XP boundaries, percentage progress) return correct values under the new thresholds.

file_operations.description: Replace the existing XP threshold array with significantly higher values that scale much more steeply (at least 2–3× higher overall). Ensure each level requires substantially more XP than the previous configuration, with disproportionately higher costs at higher levels. The new thresholds must match the updated backend progression exactly to keep frontend level calculations, XP progress bars, and boundaries consistent with backend state.

Verify that the PlayerProfile component correctly displays the player's current level, XP progress bar, and XP boundaries using the updated level system utilities. Ensure the progress bar percentage, current/next level XP display, and level badge all reflect the new steeper thresholds without requiring component logic changes (the updated levelSystem.ts utilities should handle the calculation changes transparently).
